special_text:
[+1]: Mill three cards, then return a card milled this way from your graveyard to your hand.
[-2]: Create a 0/0 black Shade creature token with “This creature gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard.”
[-6]: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then merge up to two other target creature cards from your graveyard under that creature. [i](It has all abilities of those cards.)[/i]
